channel.title: [webclient] cursor doesn't show up
channel.description:
I tried everything to fix this and the wierdest thing is i only can see the cursor in the client and the client.jar but when i try the webclient it stucks at loading - please wait
Pic: [img]http://i49.tinypic.com/6gwqqu.png[/img]
This is the error Code:
[code]Exception in thread "Thread-14" java.lang.NullPointerException at Jframe.setCursor(Jframe.java:37) at client.drawTooltip(client.java:9370) at client.draw3dScreen(client.java:8758) at client.method146(client.java:11873) at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:8039) at client.processDrawing(client.java:8687) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:108) at client.run(client.java:4666) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)[/code]
And this is my Jframe.java:37
Code:
[code]public static void setCursor(int id) { Toolkit toolkit = Toolkit.getDefaultToolkit(); Cursor cursor = toolkit.createCustomCursor(toolkit.getImage(sign.signlink.findcachedir()+ "Sprites/Cursor "+id+".PNG"), new Point(0,0), "Sprites/Cursor"+id+".PNG"); frame.setCursor(cursor); }[/code]

item.title: [webclient] cursor doesn't show up
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Groen Mod Groen
item.description:
@Mod_Groen wrote:

How can i fix this ?

Read full topic

item.title: [webclient] cursor doesn't show up
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

You are missing the cursor+id+.png sprite in your cache…

Read full topic

item.title: [webclient] cursor doesn't show up
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Groen Mod Groen
item.description:
@Mod_Groen wrote:

I tried everything to fix this and the wierdest thing is i only can see the cursor in the client and the client.jar but when i try the webclient it stucks at loading - please wait

Pic:

6gwqqu.png765×503

This is the error
Code:

Exception in thread "Thread-14" java.lang.NullPointerException at Jframe.setCursor(Jframe.java:37) at client.drawTooltip(client.java:9370) at client.draw3dScreen(client.java:8758) at client.method146(client.java:11873) at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:8039) at client.processDrawing(client.java:8687) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:108) at client.run(client.java:4666) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

And this is my Jframe.java:37

Code:

public static void setCursor(int id) { Toolkit toolkit = Toolkit.getDefaultToolkit(); Cursor cursor = toolkit.createCustomCursor(toolkit.getImage(sign.signlink.findcachedir()+ "Sprites/Cursor "+id+".PNG"), new Point(0,0), "Sprites/Cursor"+id+".PNG"); frame.setCursor(cursor); }
